name: kleiderordnung-berlin
description: portfolio website for sustainable stylist Tina Steinke

scripts.build: rm -rf dist/* && cp -r src/* dist && cp node_modules/animate.css/animate.min.css dist/css && cp node_modules/tiny-slider/dist/tiny-slider.css dist/css && cp node_modules/tiny-slider/dist/sourcemaps/*.js.map dist/sourcemaps && mkdir dist/css/sourcemaps && cp node_modules/tiny-slider/dist/sourcemaps/*.css.map dist/css/sourcemaps && cp node_modules/tiny-slider/dist/min/tiny-slider.js dist/js && npm run postCSS && node_modules/html-minifier-cli/bin/htmlmin -o dist/index.html src/index.html
scripts.pretest: npm run eslint && npm run stylelint && npm run build && npm run serve

author: Ingo Steinke
